Just a note that after you run an update, you'll get the message back on top of the program asking if you want to buy RealPlayer. But when you close the program, and open it again, that message is gone.

I don't know what else the activator do, but it replaces 20 DLLs on the folder 'rpplugins' under program files.

Anyway, it seems to be working ;-)

The instructions are:
1. Right click over activator
2. Run as administrator
3. Patch
